events.text:
My husband and I were attacked by a band of thieves close to the river near here.
I haven't told my husband Rowan, but the only thing they managed to get off us was my wedding ring.
I don't want to break his heart that it got stolen, but if you could get if for me I'm sure I can make you some food.
Rowan hasn't found out about my wedding ring yet, have you got it?

You got it! I thought it was lost forever. Thank you dear.
While you were gone, I made this for you.
